title: Uchuu Nanchara Kotetsu-kun (Space Academy)
synopsis: It follows the daily life of Kotetsu-kun, who aspires to be an astronaut, and friends at the Animal Space Academy as they all pursue their dreams.
voices: ['Fujiwara, Natsumi', 'Muro, Tsuyoshi', 'Tamaki, Masashi', 'Muro, Tsuyoshi', 'Yamaguchi, Kappei', 'Yamaguchi, Akane', 'Taketatsu, Ayana', 'Enoki, Junya']
